channel.title: Crash: Whenever game Loads.
channel.description: Ever since I got to Blast Pit and saved it. The next day I try i to load and IN GAME the loading to the next areas crash the game. EVEN IF I TRY TO RESTART THE LEVEL. So, whenever I LOAD IN GAME it crashes. Help? hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_17T4_20_34C0.mdmp (97.1 KB)

item.title: Crash: Whenever game Loads.
item.dc:creator: iiiFireDoGG
item.description:
Ever since I got to Blast Pit and saved it. The next day I try i to load and IN GAME the loading to the next areas crash the game. EVEN IF I TRY TO RESTART THE LEVEL.

So, whenever I LOAD IN GAME it crashes.

Help?
hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_17T4_20_34C0.mdmp (97.1 KB)
